name: GetMailchimpListMembers
description:
Retrieve member details from a specific Mailchimp list.

Use this tool to get information about members within a specified Mailchimp list. It's useful for accessing subscriber details such as email addresses and subscription status.

parameters.name: list_unique_id
parameters.description: The unique ID for the Mailchimp list to retrieve member information from.

value_schema.description: The unique ID for the list.

parameters.name: fields_to_return
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return. Use dot notation for sub-object parameters.

value_schema.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

parameters.name: fields_to_exclude
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of fields to exclude from the response, using dot notation for sub-objects.

value_schema.description: A comma-separated list of fields to exclude. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

parameters.name: number_of_records_to_return
parameters.description: Specify the number of records to return, between 10 and 1000, default is 10.

value_schema.description: The number of records to return. Default value is 10. Maximum value is 1000

parameters.name: pagination_offset
parameters.description: The number of records to skip for pagination. Default is 0.

value_schema.description: Used for [pagination](https://mailchimp.com/developer/marketing/docs/methods-parameters/#pagination), this is the number of records from a collection to skip. Default value is 0.

parameters.name: email_type
parameters.description: Specify the type of email format. Typically 'html' or 'text'.

value_schema.description: The email type.

parameters.name: subscriber_status
parameters.description: The status of the subscriber (e.g., subscribed, unsubscribed, cleaned, pending).

value_schema.description: The subscriber's status.

parameters.name: opt_in_after_timestamp
parameters.description: Restrict results to subscribers who opted-in after the specified timeframe in ISO 8601 format: 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00.

value_schema.description: Restrict results to subscribers who opted-in after the set timeframe. Uses ISO 8601 time format: 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00.

parameters.name: opt_in_before_timestamp
parameters.description: Restrict results to subscribers who opted in before the specified timeframe. Use ISO 8601 format.

value_schema.description: Restrict results to subscribers who opted-in before the set timeframe. Uses ISO 8601 time format: 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00.

parameters.name: changed_after_timestamp
parameters.description: Restrict results to subscribers whose information changed after the specified timestamp in ISO 8601 format (e.g., 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00).

value_schema.description: Restrict results to subscribers whose information changed after the set timeframe. Uses ISO 8601 time format: 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00.

parameters.name: restrict_change_before_timeframe
parameters.description: Restrict results to subscribers whose information changed before the provided timeframe in ISO 8601 format (e.g., '2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00').

value_schema.description: Restrict results to subscribers whose information changed before the set timeframe. Uses ISO 8601 time format: 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00.

parameters.name: unique_email_identifier
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the email address across all Mailchimp lists. Use this to filter for a specific member.

value_schema.description: A unique identifier for the email address across all Mailchimp lists.

parameters.name: filter_vip_members
parameters.description: Filter to return only VIP list members. Use `true` for VIPs only, `false` for all members.

value_schema.description: A filter to return only the list's VIP members. Passing `true` will restrict results to VIP list members, passing `false` will return all list members.

parameters.name: interest_category_id
parameters.description: The unique id for the interest category used to filter Mailchimp list members.

value_schema.description: The unique id for the interest category.

parameters.name: filter_by_interest_ids
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of interest IDs to filter list members. Must be combined with interest_category_id and interest_match.

value_schema.description: Used to filter list members by interests. Must be accompanied by interest_category_id and interest_match. The value must be a comma separated list of interest ids present for any supplied interest categories.

parameters.name: interest_match_filter
parameters.description: Specify how to match list members by interests. Options: 'any', 'all', or 'none'. Must accompany interest_category_id and interest_ids.

value_schema.description: Used to filter list members by interests. Must be accompanied by interest_category_id and interest_ids. "any" will match a member with any of the interest supplied, "all" will only match members with every interest supplied, and "none" will match members without any of the interest supplied.

parameters.name: sort_field_for_members
parameters.description: Specifies the field by which to sort the list members.

value_schema.description: Returns files sorted by the specified field.

parameters.name: sort_order_direction
parameters.description: Determines the order direction for sorted results. Common values are 'asc' for ascending and 'desc' for descending.

value_schema.description: Determines the order direction for sorted results.

parameters.name: filter_by_since_last_campaign
parameters.description: Filter subscribers by their status (subscribed/unsubscribed/pending/cleaned) since the last email campaign. Requires member status.

value_schema.description: Filter subscribers by those subscribed/unsubscribed/pending/cleaned since last email campaign send. Member status is required to use this filter.

parameters.name: filter_unsubscribed_since
parameters.description: Filter subscribers who unsubscribed since a specific date. Must use 'unsubscribed' status only.

value_schema.description: Filter subscribers by those unsubscribed since a specific date. Using any status other than unsubscribed with this filter will result in an error.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Mailchimp Marketing API.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

value_schema.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

parameters.name: exclude_fields
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of fields to exclude. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

value_schema.description: A comma-separated list of fields to exclude. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The number of records to return. Default value is 10. Maximum value is 1000

value_schema.description: The number of records to return. Default value is 10. Maximum value is 1000

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Used for [pagination](https://mailchimp.com/developer/marketing/docs/methods-parameters/#pagination), this is the number of records from a collection to skip. Default value is 0.

value_schema.description: Used for [pagination](https://mailchimp.com/developer/marketing/docs/methods-parameters/#pagination), this is the number of records from a collection to skip. Default value is 0.

parameters.name: email_type
parameters.description: The email type.

value_schema.description: The email type.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: The subscriber's status.

value_schema.description: The subscriber's status.

parameters.name: since_timestamp_opt
parameters.description: Restrict results to subscribers who opted-in after the set timeframe. Uses ISO 8601 time format: 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00.

value_schema.description: Restrict results to subscribers who opted-in after the set timeframe. Uses ISO 8601 time format: 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00.

parameters.name: before_timestamp_opt
parameters.description: Restrict results to subscribers who opted-in before the set timeframe. Uses ISO 8601 time format: 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00.

value_schema.description: Restrict results to subscribers who opted-in before the set timeframe. Uses ISO 8601 time format: 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00.

parameters.name: since_last_changed
parameters.description: Restrict results to subscribers whose information changed after the set timeframe. Uses ISO 8601 time format: 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00.

value_schema.description: Restrict results to subscribers whose information changed after the set timeframe. Uses ISO 8601 time format: 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00.

parameters.name: before_last_changed
parameters.description: Restrict results to subscribers whose information changed before the set timeframe. Uses ISO 8601 time format: 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00.

value_schema.description: Restrict results to subscribers whose information changed before the set timeframe. Uses ISO 8601 time format: 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00.

parameters.name: unique_email_id
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the email address across all Mailchimp lists.

value_schema.description: A unique identifier for the email address across all Mailchimp lists.

parameters.name: vip_only
parameters.description: A filter to return only the list's VIP members. Passing `true` will restrict results to VIP list members, passing `false` will return all list members.

value_schema.description: A filter to return only the list's VIP members. Passing `true` will restrict results to VIP list members, passing `false` will return all list members.

parameters.name: interest_category_id
parameters.description: The unique id for the interest category.

value_schema.description: The unique id for the interest category.

parameters.name: interest_ids
parameters.description: Used to filter list members by interests. Must be accompanied by interest_category_id and interest_match. The value must be a comma separated list of interest ids present for any supplied interest categories.

value_schema.description: Used to filter list members by interests. Must be accompanied by interest_category_id and interest_match. The value must be a comma separated list of interest ids present for any supplied interest categories.

parameters.name: interest_match
parameters.description: Used to filter list members by interests. Must be accompanied by interest_category_id and interest_ids. "any" will match a member with any of the interest supplied, "all" will only match members with every interest supplied, and "none" will match members without any of the interest supplied.

value_schema.description: Used to filter list members by interests. Must be accompanied by interest_category_id and interest_ids. "any" will match a member with any of the interest supplied, "all" will only match members with every interest supplied, and "none" will match members without any of the interest supplied.

parameters.description: Returns files sorted by the specified field.

value_schema.description: Returns files sorted by the specified field.

parameters.description: Determines the order direction for sorted results.

value_schema.description: Determines the order direction for sorted results.

parameters.name: since_last_campaign
parameters.description: Filter subscribers by those subscribed/unsubscribed/pending/cleaned since last email campaign send. Member status is required to use this filter.

value_schema.description: Filter subscribers by those subscribed/unsubscribed/pending/cleaned since last email campaign send. Member status is required to use this filter.

parameters.name: unsubscribed_since
parameters.description: Filter subscribers by those unsubscribed since a specific date. Using any status other than unsubscribed with this filter will result in an error.

value_schema.description: Filter subscribers by those unsubscribed since a specific date. Using any status other than unsubscribed with this filter will result in an error.

parameters.description: The unique ID for the list.

value_schema.description: The unique ID for the list.
